flawed_nl_solution:
In one week there will be 50+20=<<50+20=90>>90 seashells
In two weeks there will be 90+20=<<90+20=110>>110 seashells
In three weeks there will be 110+20=<<110+20=130>>130 seashells
In four weeks there will be 130+20=<<130+20=150>>150 seashells
#### 150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
